archimate:BusinessRole.name: Trusteeship
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: A special form of Guardianship in which a Trustee is appointed by an Identity Owner to serve as a Guardian under specific circumstances, such as illness, incapacitation, or death. See Appendix C.
